chapters.title: Chapter 14: Changes
chapters.info: Adine Canford, p. 192—Plump, blue-eyed Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah with short-cut black hair. She displays no hint of arrogance despite being raised in Andor. She is not very strong in the One Power. As Accepted, she was friends with Moiraine and Siuan, and now that they have been raised and have joined the Blue Ajah, that friendship has been renewed, thanks especially to their mutual friend, Leane.
